main event: A witness in Akron, Ohio reported seeing an unidentified object giving off sparks on March 30, 1961.
interesting points: The witness was the head of a local UFO research group and knew Captains Robert Smith and Earl Wolf of the ATIC (Air Technical Intelligence Center).
The witness did not actually see the object but received a call about the sighting and reported information from other witnesses.
Radio station in the area received multiple calls from other viewers of the object.
The object was observed for 10-15 minutes.
The object was described as giving off a white to off-white color.
witnesses: multiple witnesses, including the head of a local UFO research group
photographs: no photographs, only a report form
